question: What is a HACKATHON?
answer: Hackathons are awesome events full of creativity, tech and passionate students collaborating. We work in teams to create apps, games, robots… literally anything you want to build & learn about!

question: How much does it cost?
answer: GreatUniHack is free for all accepted hackers. We will provide you with swag, cool workshops, a few prizes and… fun!

question: What if I don't have a team?
answer: No need to worry! Part of the fun of a hackathon is meeting new people. We will have time at the beginning of the event for everyone to meet and form teams.

question: What should I use/bring to this Hackathon?
answer: Make sure you have got your laptop, chargers, phone for some games and good internet.

question: Who can apply?
answer: We accept students who are over 18 with an active *.ac.uk email address. You can also join us as a mentor! Contact us for more info.

question: Do you have a code of conduct?
answer: Yes! Smile, be nice and have fun, but all the other details can be found in our code of conduct and MLH code of conduct.

question: I don't know how to code. Can I still participate?
answer: Hackathons are for beginners. There is an amazing suit of industry experts and mentors that are happy to assist you!

question: What can I expect from GreatUniHack?
answer: An entire weekend of great company, good entertainment and plenty of swag! We'll also have a tons of mentors & loads of assistance.

question: Who owns my IP rights, code and idea?
answer: You own all the rights to your intellectual property. We won't claim any right over anything made during this event.
